trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.
trans-unit.target: 派生自此抽象基类的类可定义几何形状。

trans-unit.source: Geometry objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.
trans-unit.target: 几何对象可用于剪辑、 命中测试以及呈现二维图形数据。

trans-unit.source: ## Geometry Compared to Shape The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape?displayProperty=fullName> class has a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>, and other rendering properties that Geometry and its derived classes lack.
trans-unit.target: ##为形状的几何图形比较<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape?displayProperty=fullName>类具有<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>，和 Geometry 和及其派生的类缺少其他呈现属性。</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape> class is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and therefore participates in the layout system; its derived classes can be used as the content of any element that supports <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> children.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape>类是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，并因此参与布局系统，则为它的派生的类可以用作任何支持的元素的内容<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>子级。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape>

trans-unit.source: The Geometry class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of a shape, and cannot render itself.
trans-unit.target: Geometry 类中，另一方面，只需定义形状的几何图形，并且无法呈现自身。

trans-unit.source: Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses.
trans-unit.target: 由于其简易性，而它具有广泛的使用。

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the Geometry class provides several special features: Geometry objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能︰**从继承，因此<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，Geometry 类提供了一些特殊功能︰ 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享、 进行只读的以提高性能、 进行线程安全的几何对象和克隆，。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，它指定的轴对齐边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property does not take into account the area potentially added by a stroke.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会考虑可能由笔画添加区域。

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 轴对齐边界框的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>, making deep copies of the object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>，从而深度复制对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Combines the two geometries using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"></xref> and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.
trans-unit.target: 合并两个使用指定的几何图形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"></xref>并将指定的转换应用于所生成的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.StandardFlatteningTolerance%2A> property) when combining geometries.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用默认的公差因子 (所描述<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.StandardFlatteningTolerance%2A>属性) 时合并几何图形。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.StandardFlatteningTolerance%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify your own tolerance factor, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自己的公差因子，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> methods (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>方法 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>) 生成或使用的几何图形的多边形近似。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation.
trans-unit.target: 容差因素指定此多边形的近似中两点之间的最大距离。

trans-unit.source: Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.
trans-unit.target: 较小的容差值生成更好的近似值，但需要更多处理与某一大容差系数的近似相比。

trans-unit.source: Careful thought should be involved when using Combine to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive.
trans-unit.target: 使用组合可能耗费大量的 CPU 执行联合时，应涉及认真考虑。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> will work better.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>将更好地工作。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: Use Combine only when any of the following apply: - The geometric operation is not a union.
trans-unit.target: 使用组合仅当时任何满足以下条件:-几何操作不是联合。

trans-unit.source: - Either of the geometries has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> actually matters).
trans-unit.target: -任一几何图形的具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>值<xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>自交，几何图形并且 (即<xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>实际很重要)。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>

trans-unit.source: - Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached).
trans-unit.target: 时并不是问题，但空间 （例如，如果该几何图形是创建一次，然后缓存）。

trans-unit.source: Typically, Combine produces smaller output than <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，组合生成的输出小于<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> does not provide the desired outline.
trans-unit.target: 的将描边所生成的几何图形，或将其用于路径动画和<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>不提供所需的轮廓。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>
